title: Unplugged Programming-Based Foundational Programming Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic computing concepts and ability to solve simple logical problems
context.additional_context: A course aimed at strengthening foundational skills in task automation for office/administrative professionals, incorporating smartphone-based VR simulations to accommodate environments without PCs.

learning_goals: Learners can materialize basic programming logic (sequence, selection, iteration) through unplugged activities
Learners improve computational thinking by over 80% through collaborative problem-solving activities
Learners apply programming concepts to three or more real-world cases (e.g., document automation macros) in a VR simulation environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
